article_title: In The Future, Will Only Robots Celebrate Labor Day?

article_metadata.author: Mark P. Mills

og.description: The emerging revolution in virtual robots and algorithms promises not a dystopian future for the American worker but the beginning of the next growth cycle for the economy and jobs.
og.title: In The Future, Will Only Robots Celebrate Labor Day?
